trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to manage a template editing area.
trans-unit.target: 提供一個管理樣板編輯區的介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property to access template groups, and template definitions within template groups, for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>存取範本群組和範本群組中的控制項設計工具的範本定義的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A template editing frame represents the UI for a template editor of a templated control designer.
trans-unit.target: 樣板編輯框架代表範本的編輯器樣板化控制項設計工具的 UI。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes to the document should be saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該儲存對文件所作的變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Closes the control and optionally saves any changes.
trans-unit.target: 關閉控制項並選擇是否要儲存任何的變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A>屬性中的每個範本群組項目上<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style for the editing frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯框架的樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the Web server control style attributes for the editing frame.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，表示編輯框架的 Web 伺服器控制項樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A>屬性中的每個範本群組項目上<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的初始高度。

trans-unit.source: The initial height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的初始高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property for each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A>中每個範本群組元素的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的初始寬度。

trans-unit.source: The initial width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的初始寬度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property for each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A>中每個範本群組元素的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the editing frame.
trans-unit.target: 取得編輯框架的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the editing frame.
trans-unit.target: 編輯框架的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: The template group name is provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A> property of each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 有提供範本群組名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A>屬性中的每個範本群組項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Opens and displays the control.
trans-unit.target: 開啟並顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The new width for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The new height for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的高度。

trans-unit.source: Resizes the control to the specified width and height.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項調整為指定的寬度和高度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A>屬性中的每個範本群組項目上<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Saves any changes to the document.
trans-unit.target: 儲存對文件所作的任何變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of names of templates to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得要使用的樣板名稱集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of template names.
trans-unit.target: 樣板名稱的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: A template name is provided through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 範本名稱透過提供<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>物件。

trans-unit.source: Enumerate the collection of template definitions by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 列舉範本定義的集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A>每個屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the template styles for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的樣板樣式。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> objects that represent the template styles for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的陣列，表示控制項的樣板樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: A template style is provided through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.Style%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 透過所提供的範本樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition.Style%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>物件。

trans-unit.source: Enumerate the collection of template definitions by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 列舉範本定義的集合，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.Templates%2A>每個屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: The new name for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的新名稱。

trans-unit.source: Changes the name of the control to the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項名稱變更為指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A> property on each template group element in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupStyle%2A>屬性中的每個範本群組項目上<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the verb that invokes the template.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定叫用樣板的動作 (Verb)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" /> that invokes the template.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb" />，用來叫用樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame> 介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A> property of each template group in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup.GroupName%2A>屬性中每個範本群組<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>控制項設計工具的集合。
